SplashContent.Title: EcoDAAT
SplashContent.SubTitle: Alaska Fisheries Science Center
SplashContent.Content: The Alaska Region of NOAA Fisheries oversees sustainable fisheries that produce about half the fish caught in US waters, with responsibilities covering 842,000 square nautical miles off Alaska. The Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC) works to ensure the viability of protected species and to protect and enhance Alaska's marine habitat. EcoDAAT provides access to the biological and environmental data collected by AFSC's Recruitment Processes / EcoFOCI Program.
SplashContent.Contacts: For more information contact  Kimberly Bahl
